alert.note: Alert for Brantley; Northern Ware; Pierce; Wayne (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 6:17PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Pierce, northwestern Brantley, northeastern Ware and southwestern Wayne Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 617 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms centered over Patterson, moving southwest at 5 to 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Waycross, Blackshear, Patterson, Offerman, Jamestown, Pebble Hill, Bristol and Braganza. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
